articles.title: Godzilla Destruction is a mobile game that lets you go ham - Polygon
articles.description: Godzilla fans who are all fired up after the recent movie release — Godzilla vs. Kong — can smash some cities with an upcoming mobile game, Godzilla Destruction. Toho Games’ newest release will be coming to Android and iOS, allowing players to take the role o…
